program.name: DHSP Afterschool Programs Lottery (K-8)
program.description_short: Affordable afterschool care for Cambridge children K-8
program.description:
DHSP Afterschool Programs Lottery provides affordable afterschool care and enrichment for Cambridge children in grades K-8, with tuition based on what families can afford.

The program uses a lottery system for placements, and tuition is set on a sliding scale based on household size and income. Some programs are free for eligible grades (e.g., free tuition for 6-8th graders enrolled in CYP afterschool).

To qualify, you must:
- Be a Cambridge resident
- Have children entering grades K-8

Note: This is a lottery-based program. Applying does not guarantee a slot. Applications for Fall must be complete by May 1.
program.website_description: Affordable afterschool care for Cambridge children K-8 with sliding-scale tuition

warning_message.message: This is a lottery-based program. Applying does not guarantee a slot. Applications for Fall must be complete by May 1.
